ygData.subject: RE: Mask of Deception and ultravision
ygData.msgSnippet: My UV seems to work just find with the *old* mask doing just what you re doing - fighting Bouncers inside Oggok.  I don t remember my songs ever ending the UV
ygData.messageBody:
My UV seems to work just find with the *old* mask doing just what you're
doing - fighting Bouncers inside Oggok. I don't remember my songs ever
ending the UV effect.

One point I'd like to make is that I've been using those vendors in Oggok a
lot lately, and if you sneak behind them and buy/sell your prices are a lot
better than as a DE, although sneaking is less convenient. I'm the group's
designated looter, I loot every Bouncer until my AGI starts dropping (with a
Shaman in the group no less, heh) and then sell and /split. Therefore, the
price difference of 1pp per Long Sword adds up over the course of the night.

[45 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: Oggok

> The end result is that I hardly ever activate the illusion anymore. Only
> reason I do it in Ogguk is so I can sell to the merchant with an amiable
> /con.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
